body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Juan Ward and the customer's name is Lisa Hughes.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I'm with BrightTech Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Sarah! I'm looking for some information about your internet services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I'd be happy to help with that. May I start by asking your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! I appreciate your time. To provide you with the best options, could you please tell me your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, one two three four five. And could you also provide me with your current monthly budget for internet services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking to spend around fifty dollars each month.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that, John. With your budget, I can recommend a couple of plans that would suit you well.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Great! I'm looking forward to hearing about them.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, John! I'll make sure to get back to you with the information you need. Have a wonderful day!
